title: Drawing, ""The Pine Trees of El Monte," California.", April 10, 1898
medium: Graphite, brown ink, pen, watercolor wash, and white guache.
markings: an escutcheon along the right edge.
inscribed: Caption as copied, date bottom left.
description: A group of pines is flanked by two pines at left, a row of pines at right. Bottom, inverse direction, pencil outline of a tree top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, ""The Pine Trees of El Monte," California.", April 10, 1898.
April 10, 1898. Graphite, brown ink, pen, watercolor wash, and white guache.. Gift of Mrs. Samuel Colman. 1939-85-6.
